name: Mystery Morph
description:
Mystery Morph is an adventure game where the player can explore and world map and face a lot of challenges like enemies or obstacles. Unlock New Abilites, Explore New Areas,  Beat the Enemies and Epic Bosses

Lore summary: You were a living water God called Morph and there was Xihnir, the God of the Deep who shattered you with The Dark Trident and conquered the world by turning everyone hollow. Without knowing, he left 1 piece of Morph in a cave. You as the Morph piece must merge with your other pieces which imprisoned by Xihnir and put an end to Xihnir 

This is my solo project that I've been working for 2 months, this game is inspired by Hollow Knight and Cuphead

Background Music by Eric Matyas https://soundimage.org/

And Mailto https://soundcloud.com/mailtomusic

Don't Forget To Subscribe To Livander Gamedev https://youtube.com/livandergamedev
